page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT IN DALBEATTIE
page.content: The biggest employer in Dalbeattie is {"Stelrads".}This firm makes steel radiators.They get their materials from the British Steel Corporation and sell their products all over the U.K. and in many foreign countries.They employ 214 workers,but at one time had 280 employees. { "Kastix"}is a firm which makes leisure and fashion wear.They have 155 workers and 95 sewing machines.They get their materials, mainly denim, from Hong Kong, West Germany, Turkey, France, and Denmark.They sell their goods to the U.K.,Ireland and West Germany. { The Scottish Milk Marketing Board}has a creamery in Dalbeattie.Top quality cheese is made there and sold all over the world.Twenty-four people are employed there. The unemployment figure is 12.7%
